headline: Mercantile Bank Selects Jack Henry for Focus on Innovation and Growth
summary: Jack Henry™ (Nasdaq: JKHY) announced today that Mercantile Bank, Michigan's largest community bank, has selected Jack Henry to evolve its technology infrastructure, streamline operations, and support its long-term growth strategy.
